create one dataframe, to rule them all 
```{r}
df <- data.frame(matrix(ncol = 3, nrow = 1228))
names(df)[1] <- "TN_sub_rate"
names(df)[2] <- "PER_sub_rate"
names(df)[3] <- "PD_sub_rate"
```

plot
```{r}
p <- ggplot(ToothGrowth, aes(x=dose, y=len)) + geom_boxplot()
p
```
